name: Super Space fighter
description:
The first games assignment I had in first year of university,  we had to make a verticle scrolling space shooter, using Unity, the ship had to move forward backwards left and right,  and move forward twice as fast as it moved back. The theme was Retro so I went for a Arcade cabinet feel.

I created all art, and music used in the assignment myself using Pyxel edit and BoscaCeoil.

Controls-

WASD= movement

space/left click = shoot
